{"name": "Arverne View Community Food Distribution Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Registration on website required before moving further with the food DELIVERY process https://form.jotform.com/233054756403150 Then you will receive id to order food online


Part of The Campaign Against Hunger organization", "email": "", "url": "https://www.tcahnyc.org/locations/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "57-17 Rockaway Beach Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Arverne", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11692", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.5918475, "longitude": -73.7878383}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 773-3551", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Online Pantry System only."}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Delivery may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required for all members of the household"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once Every 2 weeks"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
